text: Hi All, need to map an array of strings to a multi-line input in HubSpot via the ecommerce-bridge
is just string delimited? and if so what is the delimiter to use?
Hi All, I'm trying to map a datetime to a date field using the mapping in the ecommerce-bridge

the value i'm sending is todays date 1594080000000 but I keep getting this sync error `Date is not at midnight. Timestamps in ms synced for date properties must be at exactly midnight in ms for that date. Properties`
I've tried sending it as a numeric value (no " around it) and as a string but still get the error
The receiving property on HubSpot side was created with Field Type = Date Picker
